args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Power Windows May Pinch/FMVSS 118

Ford Motor Company (Ford) is recalling certain 2024 Ranger and 2024 Lincoln Nautilus vehicles previously repaired incorrectly under recall number 24V-597.  When closing the windows with the global closing feature, the windows may not automatically reverse after detecting an object.  As such, these vehicles fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard number 118, "Power-Operated Window Systems."A closing window may exert excessive force and pinch a driver or passenger before retracting, increasing the risk of injury.

Number of Units Affected: 1168.0
